full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP) - Hydro-sedimentary Modeling Study of Grande-Entrée-Îles-de-la-Madeleine Harbour

## Project Title
Hydro-sedimentary Modeling Study of the Siltation of the Access Channel to Grande-Entrée-Îles-de-la-Madeleine Harbour and the Search for Solutions

## Reference Number
CB-643-62425750

## Notice Publication and Closing Date
The Request for Proposal (RFP) was published on October 20, 2023, with a tender closing date of *December 11, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Standard Time)*.

## Project Description
Fisheries and Oceans Canada/Small Craft Program intends to hire an engineering firm through a competitive process to provide the services required for this project. The services include a hydro-sedimentary modeling study of the siltation of the access channel to the fishing harbour of Grande-Entrée and the search for solutions to this siltation.

## Period of the Contract
The contract period will be from the date of the contract to March 31, 2025, inclusively.

## Trade Agreements
The requirement is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Procurement Method
The procurement method is competitive - open bidding.

## Notice Type
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) notice.

## Selection Criteria
The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is Fisheries and Oceans Canada.

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact Marie-France Chrétien at (450) 521-4448 or marie-france.chretien@dfo-mpo.gc.ca.

## Notice Documents
The notice documents, including the RFP and addenda, are available on the Canada Buys website at the following links:

* [RFP Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22763/30004382---rfp.pdf)
* [Addendum 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender
